titleStmt.title: [The young] lover, or, A new way of wooing. ... To the tune of The zealous lover, or, A fig for France, &c.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A97240 of text R187780 in the English Short Title Catalog (Wing Y104A). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 6 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 1 1-bit group-IV TIFF page image.

The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
